comments:
1. create a php file and open in editor
2. Open the file in filesystem and change its content
3. Editor loads great
4. Close the editor and change the file outside eclipse
5. Click an element in outline , request to sync is fine --> but sometimes the 
below error prmpts after it --> but user functionality is ok.
